targets.expr: max by (job, namespace, controller, controller_name) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Off"})) * 0
or
sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Initial"})) * 0 + 1
or
sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Auto"})) * 0 + 2
or
sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Recreate"})) * 0 + 3

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", recommendation_type="target", resource_type="cpu"}[$__range]))
  ) 
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))) * sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"})))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])
      )
    )
  or
  count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", recommendation_type="target", resource_type="memory"}[$__range]))
  ) 
  or  
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

(max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) * on(controller_type, controller_name) kube_controller_replicas{namespace="$namespace"})
or
max by (controller_type, controller_name) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) * 0

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller)
(kube_controller_replicas - kube_controller_replicas_ready))
or
max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) * 0

sum by (controller) 
  (
    kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"}) by (controller) * 0

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
(kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas == 1)) * 1

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >   0) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  0.3)) > bool 0)  * 2

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >=   0.3) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  0.6)) > bool 0)  * 3

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >=   0.6) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  1)) > bool 0)  * 4

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller)
(kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas == 0)) * 5

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv]))))

panels.description: Total может быть не равен system + user из-за особенностей учета cgroup в ядре. Более детально можно почитать тут: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv]))))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv]))))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv]))))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: На данном графике отображается запрошенные (requested) ресурсы CPU выше реального потребления CPU. По факту, сколько еще CPU необходимо "застолбить" для корректной работы сервиса.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: На данном графике отображается потребление CPU выше запрошенных (requested) ресурсов CPU. Т.е. по факту, сколько еще CPU необходимо "застолбить" для корректной работы сервиса.
panels.title: Under-requested by controller

panels.description: Если на графике нет данных, значит не заданы ресурсы для контейнеров

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))) * sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"})))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))) * sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace"}))))

panels.title: Throttling

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

panels.title: $controller

panels.description: Total может быть не равен system + user из-за особенностей учета cgroup в ядре. Более детально можно почитать тут: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

panels.title: $controller

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_rv])))

panels.title: $controller

panels.description: Метрика Working set bytes - реально используемая память контейнером, так как включает active file memory. И пр достижении данного значения к лимиту, может прийти OOMKiller. Данное значение может быть выше RSS + Cache. Так как не вся active file memory является Cache.
panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: На данном графике отображается запрошенные (requested) ресурсы Memory выше реального потребления Memory. По факту, сколько еще Memory необходимо "застолбить" для корректной работы сервиса.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: На данном графике отображается потребление Memory выше запрошенных (requested) ресурсов Memory. Т.е. по факту, сколько еще Memory необходимо "застолбить" для корректной работы сервиса.

panels.title: $controller

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_rv]))))

panels.description:
На данном графике не отображается информация о дисках, со StorageClass с названием (/local.+/), так как в local storage дисках потребленное место рассчитывается неверно. 

Тут рисуются ТОЛЬКО используемые в данный момент (НЕ local storage) диски.
panels.title: PVC Usage (except local storage classes)

panels.description:
На данном графике не отображается информация о дисках, со StorageClass с названием (/local.+/), так как в local storage дисках потребленное место рассчитывается неверно. 

Тут рисуются ТОЛЬКО используемые в данный момент (НЕ local storage) диски.
panels.title: PVC Usage in % (except local storage classes)

targets.expr:
max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max by (persistentvolume) (max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__range])) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  max by (persistentvolume, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) 
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) 
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__interval]) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$persistentvolumeclaim"}[$__interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__interval]) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$persistentvolumeclaim"}[$__interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__interval]) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$persistentvolumeclaim"}[$__interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__interval]) 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_right() 
  (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$persistentvolumeclaim"}[$__interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
  )
)
